name: yahoo-fantasy-mcp
description: Model Context Protocol server for Yahoo Fantasy Sports API

scripts.build:optimized: bun build src/index.ts --compile --minify --target=bun --outfile yahoo-mcp && strip yahoo-mcp 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:all: bun build src/index.ts --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile yahoo-mcp-darwin-arm64 && bun build src/index.ts --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile yahoo-mcp-darwin-x64 && bun build src/index.ts --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile yahoo-mcp-linux-x64
scripts.build:small: bun build src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target bun --minify && echo '#!/usr/bin/env bun' > dist/yahoo-mcp && cat dist/index.js >> dist/yahoo-mcp && chmod +x dist/yahoo-mcp
scripts.test:all: bun run test-mcp-integration.ts && bun run test-sse-flow.ts
scripts.size: ls -lh yahoo-mcp dist/yahoo-mcp dist/index.js 2>/dev/null || echo 'No builds found'
